channel.title: Wolf scaper 317 development
channel.description:
ok, well im remaking my 317.
I know everyone is familiar with delta sourc
*No not another delta leech*
dont worry, i alredy remade it...it dont look like delta...
but im going to remake it..
some features
-features-
pest control - with npc's spawning from portals - attacking void knight - 88% fight pits - working delayed attacks - npc's spawn after a while - 100% barbarian assult - removed for new minigame battle island - 10 waves of npc's - each wave gets harder - reward is 4k assult points - not started fight caves - 100 waves - theres 5 jads on last wave - jads can only hit 10-15 since theres 5 - 100% bring a team in fight pits - bring a team with you without lagging and npc's dieing - 200 waves though - 100% full magic - all modern magic, lunars working, ancients - all hit - ice attacks freeze npc's and players - 100% good economy - 100 clue scrolls - all different - different types of rewards - 100% npc's - theres over 2k npc's and - each have the right animations and prayer working for all - 100% drops - 32k new drops added - premium members get better chance of drops - 100% new teleports - each spell book has different tele's - 90% spells hitting - the max a spell can hit is like a 50 and thats with ancient mage ice barrage - 100% food timer - must wait 2 seconds after eating to eat again - 100% clan chat - so you can talk to clan members and hold events - 56% working music tab with songs - i put a tut in client, that way you can add songs of your own - 100% added holiday events - christmas, thanksgiving, easter, arber day (lol) - 100% dueling - staking and working removal stuff - 20% glory ammy's and ring of dueling - adds like 12 more tele's if your member - 100% worlds - world 1 and 2 - can communicate with people from both worlds - 60% members objects - only members can go in members places - 100% members items - if you log into free world object is unusable in that world - 55% pest control rewards - new interface - 12 rewards - xp, items - 100% pest control - doesn't reset when new people enter - need to hit a 50+ in total damage to get points - 100% summoning - added this for all npc's - when you summon it takes away your prayer - 100% all skills working - all of em' even farming - 100% kq - has 2 stages and hits with range, mage, and melee - 100% barrows - when your in barrows it randomly gives option to tele to tunnels - 100% working tunnels - doors may not open for you but for others - cant follow here - 100% npc's - cant no-clip because i re-inforced everything with objects - 80% server on dedicated - this way 100% lag free - 100% over 200 people on at a time - this is a goal - 50% - max is 100 working ring of stone - turns you into a stone in which you cannot move - 100% working monkey gree-gree's - turns you into monkeys! - 100% all specials - all specials working properly and wont lag people - 70% full pking - all level's working - 100% kbd - fires 10 spells per 5 sec's - can hit up to 30 without protection - 100% kbd - uses more than 20 attacks - can hit up to 90 with fire if you no got anti drag shield - 100% only 1 connection per ip - no syi - allows people to have more than 1 account - 100% all weps working - 100%
well, in the source before i release im going to put the complete list of npc's animations in it - 203kb -
no pictures atm since i just got up - will post some soon
if your wondering i got some ideas from
HYDRASCAPE
lol, i plan on my source being betta though...

item.description:
@josh_le3t wrote:

Sounds like it’s going to be good but the part that killed me is the 200 waves of jad in my opinion you should make it like runescape or something with 1 jad, I’m just saying lol Because dont you think you puted to much and that 1 jad to hit how its suppose to but other then that i’m sure it will be good, oh and like i was saying ya if you can help me with making a 508 in “http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,330345.0.html” thats the url go and check it out if you can and reply i’d really appreciate if you do.

item.title: Wolf scaper 317 development
item.dc:creator: @wolfs_goal wolfs goal
item.description:
@wolfs_goal wrote:

ok, well im remaking my 317.

I know everyone is familiar with delta sourc

No not another delta leech

dont worry, i alredy remade it…it dont look like delta…

but im going to remake it…

some features

-features-

pest control - with npc’s spawning from portals - attacking void knight - 88%
fight pits - working delayed attacks - npc’s spawn after a while - 100%
barbarian assult - removed for new minigame
battle island - 10 waves of npc’s - each wave gets harder - reward is 4k assult points - not started
fight caves - 100 waves - theres 5 jads on last wave - jads can only hit 10-15 since theres 5 - 100%
bring a team in fight pits - bring a team with you without lagging and npc’s dieing - 200 waves though - 100%
full magic - all modern magic, lunars working, ancients - all hit - ice attacks freeze npc’s and players - 100%
good economy - 100 clue scrolls - all different - different types of rewards - 100%
npc’s - theres over 2k npc’s and - each have the right animations and prayer working for all - 100%
drops - 32k new drops added - premium members get better chance of drops - 100%
new teleports - each spell book has different tele’s - 90%
spells hitting - the max a spell can hit is like a 50 and thats with ancient mage ice barrage - 100%
food timer - must wait 2 seconds after eating to eat again - 100%
clan chat - so you can talk to clan members and hold events - 56%
working music tab with songs - i put a tut in client, that way you can add songs of your own - 100%
added holiday events - christmas, thanksgiving, easter, arber day (lol) - 100%
dueling - staking and working removal stuff - 20%
glory ammy’s and ring of dueling - adds like 12 more tele’s if your member - 100%
worlds - world 1 and 2 - can communicate with people from both worlds - 60%
members objects - only members can go in members places - 100%
members items - if you log into free world object is unusable in that world - 55%
pest control rewards - new interface - 12 rewards - xp, items - 100%
pest control - doesn’t reset when new people enter - need to hit a 50+ in total damage to get points - 100%
summoning - added this for all npc’s - when you summon it takes away your prayer - 100%
all skills working - all of em’ even farming - 100%
kq - has 2 stages and hits with range, mage, and melee - 100%
barrows - when your in barrows it randomly gives option to tele to tunnels - 100%
working tunnels - doors may not open for you but for others - cant follow here - 100%
npc’s - cant no-clip because i re-inforced everything with objects - 80%
server on dedicated - this way 100% lag free - 100%
over 200 people on at a time - this is a goal - 50% - max is 100
working ring of stone - turns you into a stone in which you cannot move - 100%
working monkey gree-gree’s - turns you into monkeys! - 100%
all specials - all specials working properly and wont lag people - 70%
full pking - all level’s working - 100%
kbd - fires 10 spells per 5 sec’s - can hit up to 30 without protection - 100%
kbd - uses more than 20 attacks - can hit up to 90 with fire if you no got anti drag shield - 100%
only 1 connection per ip - no syi - allows people to have more than 1 account - 100%
all weps working - 100%

well, in the source before i release im going to put the complete list of npc’s animations in it - 203kb -

no pictures atm since i just got up - will post some soon

if your wondering i got some ideas from

HYDRASCAPE

lol, i plan on my source being betta though…

Read full topic
